lines.text: So far we've had a woman with no hair, a woman with no teeth, and a woman with hair on her teeth.
What have I done to deserve this? I'm not a bad person! I haven't killed my father or slept with my mother!
Hey, don't knock it till you've tried it.
I'm going into town to throw rocks at old people, d'you fancy coming?
Yeah, Blag's gonna carry the rocks.
